extendedIngredients.name: macaroni & cheese mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (7-1/4 ounces) macaroni and cheese dinner mix

extendedIngredients.name: mushroom
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (4 ounces) mushroom stems and pieces, drained

extendedIngredients.name: shredded mexican cheese blend
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup (4 ounces) shredded Mexican cheese blend

recipes.title: Baked Macaroni N Cheese Pizza

winePairing.pairingText: Sangiovese, Barbera Wine, and Shiraz are great choices for Pizza. The best wine for pizza depends on the toppings! Red sauce pizza will call for a red wine with some acidity, such as a barberan or sangiovese. Add pepperoni or sausage and you can go bolder with a syrah. The Selvapiana Chianti Rufina with a 4.3 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 14 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Selvapiana Chianti Rufina
productMatches.description: This is a big and juicy Chianti Rufina, offering delicious strawberry and cherry aromas followed by subtle notes of spice box, leather, earth and mushrooms. Dense, smooth and medium-bodied, with great concentration and fine tannins.Easy-going and supple, this is great food wine: ideal for rich pastas, creamy soups, barbecued meats and cheeses.

recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Prepare macaroni and cheese according to package directions; gradually stir in eggs.                                                                                           Spread onto a greased 12-in. pizza pan. Bake at 375째 for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in pizza sauce.                                                                                            Spread over macaroni crust. Sprinkle with mushrooms, pepperoni and cheese blend. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until a thermometer inserted in crust reads 160째 and cheese is melted.                                        Yield: 8 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Macaroni 'n' Cheese Pizza in  Taste of HomeAugust/September 2010, p77                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 slice equals 332 calories, 20 g fat (10 g saturated fat), 108 mg cholesterol, 723 mg sodium, 22 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 17 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Prepare macaroni and cheese according to package directions; gradually stir in eggs.
Spread onto a greased 12-in. pizza pan.
Bake at 375째 for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in pizza sauce.
Spread over macaroni crust. Sprinkle with mushrooms, pepperoni and cheese blend.
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until a thermometer inserted in crust reads 160째 and cheese is melted.
